name: obsidian-daily-task-rollover
description: Moves unchecked items from yesterday's daily note to today's daily note

scripts.postversion: node scripts/version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json && git commit --amend --no-edit && git tag -f v$(node scripts/get-version.mjs)
scripts.release-patch: yarn version --patch && git push && git push origin v$(node scripts/get-version.mjs)
scripts.release-minor: yarn version --minor && git push && git push origin v$(node scripts/get-version.mjs)
scripts.release-major: yarn version --major && git push && git push origin v$(node scripts/get-version.mjs)
